snippet: The Tata Nano was aimed at consumers, but some analysts described the new RE60 as an upscale rickshaw.
abstract: RE60, a new ultracheap small car introduced in India by Bajaj Auto, is being described as an upscale rickshaw; company has no plans to market the vehicle to the average consumer, positioning the RE60 as short-distance taxi. Photo (M)4

byline.original: By VIKAS BAJAJ and SRUTHI GOTTIPATI; Vikas Bajaj reported from Mumbai, and Sruthi Gottipati from New Delhi

lead_paragraph: India has a new ultracheap small car. Well, sort of.

headline.main: In India, a 'People's Car' Aimed at Rickshaw Drivers
